block.p: BRACKEN-Margaret. Of Belle Harbor N.Y. on July 11, 2000. Wife of the late John. Lovng mother of Sr. Agnes Marie, DW, Msgr. John and Martin L. (Kate). Adored grandmother of Kassie. Dear sister of Vincent Carroll, Kathryn Healy, Agnes and John Leahy, Marion and William De Haven, dear sister-in-law of Cele Carroll. Also survived by many nieces and nephews. Reposing at Denis S. O'Connor Funeral Home, 91-05 Beach Channel Drive, Rockaway Beach, N.Y. Mass of Christian Burial, Friday, 10:30AM St. Francis De Sales R.C. Church, Belle Harbor, N.Y. Interment St. John's Cemetery. Visiting 2-4:30 and 7-9PM.
